trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.ExponentialRetry</codeEntityReference> class.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.ExponentialRetry</codeEntityReference> class.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.ExponentialRetry</codeEntityReference> class using the specified delta and maximum number of retries.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.RetryPolicies.ExponentialRetry</codeEntityReference> class using the specified delta and maximum number of retries.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the back-off interval between retries.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:System.TimeSpan</codeEntityReference> specifying the back-off interval between retries.

trans-unit.source: An integer specifying the maximum number of retry attempts.
trans-unit.target: An integer specifying the maximum number of retry attempts.
